about_the_game:
Get ready to mix brains with brawn! Step into a world where real-time tactics meet the thrill of card gaming, inspired by the fast-paced strategy of tactical shooters.

Build your deck, outsmart your opponents, and lead your team to victory in intense matches that require both quick thinking and strategic planning. Whether you're a casual gamer looking for some fun or a competitive player aiming to rise to the top, this game has something for everyone.

With a playful and engaging atmosphere, you'll dive headfirst into battles that are bursting with adrenaline. Each card and move can turn the tide, so stay sharp and on your toes.

Join the action now and prove your tactical prowess! 🃏🎮💥

Key Features:

  • Real-Time Tactical Gameplay: Engage in real-time matches that test your strategic thinking.

  • Card-Based Mechanics: Build and customize your deck to suit your playstyle.

  • Inspired by Tactical Shooters: Experience gameplay elements reminiscent of team based tactical shooters.

  • Casual and Playful Mood: Enjoy a game that’s both fun and challenging for all types of gamers.

  • Adrenaline-Pumping Matches: Every move counts in these fast-paced, high-stakes battles.

Are you ready to lead your team to victory? The battlefield awaits!

name: Rush Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11

short_description: Build your deck, play your tactics, boost your battalion, and lead your team to victory in real-time, multiplayer matches that require both quick thinking and strategic planning. Players familiar with FPS & tactical shooter games will feel at home but fresh eyes brings fresh approaches. 🎮🃏💥
